data.title: IPL5 v1 Roster Released [PS3]
data.text:
We've finished the Friends Life T20 roster. It has up to date squads of the 2011 Friends Life T20 competition. Since there are 18 counties, some of the international teams have been replaced.

Please Note that most of the international players have been replaced.

Credits: GoaWarrior- A lot of research, timchrist984- making the roster

Here are the teams that are replaced:

Derbyshire ? Codemasters

Durham - Thunder

Essex - Sri Lanka

Glamorgan - Burn

Gloucestershire- Centurions

Hampshire ? India

Kent - Bermuda

Lancashire - Devils

Leicestershire - South Africa

Middlesex - Canada

Northamptonshire - West Indies

Nottinghamshire - Lizards

Somerset - Zimbabwe

Surrey - Trickstar

Warwickshire ? New Zealand

Worcestershire - Aces

Yorkshire - Wolves

Instructions for download :

1. Download the file, named ?PS3?

2. Extract it using Winrar or a similar program

3. Copy the extracted PS3 folder on to a USB

4. Plug the USB in to your PS3

5. Go to ?Game? then ?Save Data Utility?

6. In ?Save Data Utility? you will find a folder of your USB

7. Copy the ?User Preferences and Settings? file in to your ?Save Data Utility? folder.

8. You will have to replace your existing files, so if you want to keep them, back them up to a USB. Alternatively, create a new PS3 profile and add the downloaded files to its ?Save Data Utility? folder. Then you will be able to continue to use your files and just play on the other profile when you want to play with this roster.

NB: When you play the game it will say that trophies have been disabled

PS3 File

Friend's Life t20 : Released

2006-07 Ashes Roster : Released

Australian Domestic Roster v1 : Released

International v1 (TimChrist984)

International Roster v2 (Divadinho & CCCakumbra NOT Me or Tim) : Released

IPL 4 Patch v1 (Epic Version) : Released

IPL 4 v2 (Squads of 16) : Released

Instructions for Download :

1. Download Any Patch it'll come in a PS3 Folder if your stuck watch video above

2. Get A USB stick (preferably empty) & Copy and Paste the Folder PS3 there.

3. Put The USB stick into your PS3.

4. Now Create a New User at the very beginning before you choose which user you will play on.

5. Name it whatever you like.

6. Go to the game tab and go to the Game Save Data Utility PS3 and press X .

7.Then click X on the USB Device Find and Locate the ‘User Preferences and Settings’ and the ‘User Stats’ files once you find them Press Triangle and then Press X on the Copy Button... Do this to both of them One at a time.

8. Let It Save onto your PS3.

9. Insert IC2010 International Cricket 2010.

10. Play!​

GoaWarrior has edited and improved my Friends Life t20 County patch. He has given some players a stat boost and added Sussex to the roster. Now the wicket-keepers stand up to the stumps for medium pacers, but they bowl 100-115KM/H.

Here are the teams that are replaced:

Derbyshire ? Codemasters

Durham - Thunder

Essex - Sri Lanka

Glamorgan - Burn

Gloucestershire- Centurions

Hampshire ? India

Kent - Kenya

Lancashire - Devils

Leicestershire - South Africa

Middlesex - Canada

Northamptonshire - West Indies

Nottinghamshire - Lizards

Somerset - Zimbabwe

Surrey - Trickstar

Sussex: Bermuda

Warwickshire ? New Zealand

Worcestershire - Aces

Yorkshire - Wolves

Instructions for download :

1. Download the file, named ?PS3?

2. Extract it using Winrar or a similar program

3. Copy the extracted PS3 folder on to a USB

4. Plug the USB in to your PS3

5. Go to ?Game? then ?Save Data Utility?

6. In ?Save Data Utility? you will find a folder of your USB

7. Copy the ?User Preferences and Settings? file in to your ?Save Data Utility? folder.

8. You will have to replace your existing files, so if you want to keep them, back them up to a USB. Alternatively, create a new PS3 profile and add the downloaded files to its ?Save Data Utility? folder. Then you will be able to continue to use your files and just play on the other profile when you want to play with this roster.

NB: When you play the game it will say that trophies have been disabled
